item.description:
“NOTHING IMPORTANT EVER HAPPENS TO US WITHOUT FIRST BEING PREVIEWED IN DREAMS.” - Edgar Cayce

Learn How to Remember Your Dream
and Techniques of Dream Interpretation

  • Predict the Future
  • Discover Hidden Talents
  • Discover Past Lives
  • Gain Insight Into Your Destiny
  • Connect With Those On The Other Side
  • Receive Messages From Spirit
  • Problem Solve


Receive a Handout of Common Symbols and Their Meanings.

Bring a dream you wish to interpret!


Presented by Lois Quinn, an Official Representative of the Association for Research and Enlightenment (ARE), the Edgar Cayce foundation. She is a long time student of the Readings of Edgar Cayce, Study Group Facilitator, and Editor/Contributor to Seventh Cycle Newsletter. She has a Masters Degree in Education and a Certificate of Advanced Graduate Study. She is a retired Mathematics Educator and Administrator. She is a Mediatorist Minister of Our Lady of All Nations (interdenominational), an Akisni Healer (Native American), and Magnified Healer (Master Level).


Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. Space is limited to 25 people. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend, to allow others to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel, please visit http://www.swedenborg...
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by the parking lot, up stairs, through hallway, left into parlor.
item.name: Edgar Cayce On Dreams: Awaken to Your Higher Self!
